data.name: Untamed Tactics
data.detailed_description:
Summary


Untamed Tactics is a narrative-driven Tactical Roleplaying Game where you play through the memories of the retired rabbit general Greycoat. Experience Greycoat’s past in isometric 2.5D tactical battles, and learn how he grew from a disgraced soldier to becoming the leader of an unlikely town of free animals.

Each Story he tells his granddaughter is a self-contained mini-adventures that combines a linear story campaign with a procedural world filled with beautifully illustrated, colorful animals.

Choose your party, equip yourself in the Camp and set out into the Wilds. Pick your choice of regions and battle, talk and think your way through both linear and procedural encounters until you finally battle the boss. Gather Echoes to unlock more loot, characters and permanent upgrades for your next story!

Features


  • Tactical combat: Smart Power management and clever positioning will be your key to victory. Push your enemies into toxic ooze or gang up on them for extra powerful attacks!



  • Tactical combat: Smart Power management and clever positioning will be your key to victory. Push your enemies into toxic ooze or gang up on them for extra powerful attacks!

  • A rabbit with a troubled past: Join Greycoat in his adventures, and meet a diverse cast of colorful characters to ally or do battle with! Help Greycoat regain his honor by confronting the past, and the many threats of the Wilds.



  • Deep customization: Empower your characters and perfect your strategy by customizing your roster of characters with a wide range of Classes, Gems, Runes, Tomes and Consumables.

  • Constant progression: Earn Echoes of the past by completing stories and Campaign quests, which can be spent to unlock new characters, loot and encounters!



  • Parley with foes: Use the Parley system to talk to your enemies during combat. Use your deck of Parley cards to unlock special effects that can change the tide of battle!

  • Highly replayable: Explore a wide range of strategies, combos and character builds. The procedural world keeps constantly changing, new difficulty modes allow for extra challenges for the foolhardy, while streamlined systems allow for players of various skill levels to join the fray!

Social

data.short_description: Untamed Tactics is a Tactical RPG with strategic combat set in a procedural world filled with colorful animals. Relive the legend of Greycoat’s escape into the untamed Wilds in a tale of lost honor, as you fight, talk and think your way through this beautifully illustrated adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4th Gen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 660
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4th Gen
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 770
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Mountain Lion
  • Processor: 2.9GHz quad-core Intel Core i5 processor
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X Mountain Lion
  • Processor: 3.2GHz quad-core Intel Core i5 processor
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 675MX
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
